name: ClpSolver
brief: Standalone Clp solver driver and command-line interface

algorithms.name:
Clp Main Driver with ABC Dispatch
Provides the main entry points for running Clp as a standalone solver:
- ClpMain0(): Initialize model with default settings
- ClpMain1(): Process command queue or command-line arguments

Features:
- Signal handler: Ctrl+C sets iteration limit to 0 for graceful stop
- BLAS threading control: Defaults to single-thread (openblas_set_num_threads)
- AMPL interface: clpReadAmpl() reads .nl files
- FOREIGN_BARRIER: Detects availability of external Cholesky solvers

ABC_INHERIT mode: When enabled, uses AbcSimplex instead of ClpSimplex
for SIMD-optimized solving.

User-driven extensions (CLP_USER_DRIVEN1):
- userChoiceValid1(): Validate leaving variable choice
- userChoiceValid2(): Validate in/out pair
- userChoiceWasGood(): Post-pivot callback

see: AbcSimplex for the ABC optimized variant
